title: Don't Leave Me
body:
by FullmetalKarneval13

How many more hits can Yoongi take before he starts to fall, how many more times will his heart have to shatter before there’s a light at the end of the tunnel… how many more days will he have to suffer before he loses his damn mind.

(suffering a terrible loss, what will it take for Yoongi to move on, and who will be there to help him from the darkness that tries to bring him down)

blog.name: frustrataed
blog.description:
♡
you are the cause of my euphoria ♡

summary: 【6:15pm】  Jungkook insists on you playing videogames with him but you’re certainly not a master, refusing to accept his offer....
body:
【6:15pm】

Jungkook insists on you playing videogames with him but you’re certainly not a master, refusing to accept his offer. But after he playfully calls you a coward, you shove him, making way to sit next to him on the couch.

“Alright then, bring it on, loser!”

After five rounds you’re certainly the big winner, laughing at Jungkook’s never-fading frown.

“How-how is this possible, I-”

You sympathetically pat his shoulder, trying to keep a straight face.

“Don’t worry, baby, maybe next time…You just need to practice a little bit more!” You say between giggles, proud of yourself and the skills you never thought you had.

Jungkook shoots you a death glare before pining you against the couch, attacking you with tickles.

“Are you making fun of me, sweetheart?” 

You scream between laughs, shaking your head.

“I could never!”

summary: I’m gonna listen to them a bit more and give em a try, so far I enjoyed the debut song, I think the boys are so damn adorable....
body:
About TXT

I’m gonna listen to them a bit more and give em a try, so far I enjoyed the debut song, I think the boys are so damn adorable. It’s not that I’m biased or comparing them or anything but it felt weird in a good way, just to see bighit taking a more gentler and cuter approach to a boy group, especially when TXT is younger than BTS. I kinda want to explore it in a way. When BTS debuted it was a more bad boy/rough approach with the Dark & Wild album. I’m looking forward to seeing what TXT will do ☺️ I like this new approach from bighit. I hope TXT does well!

Love, Ava 🖤
